kollupitiya dumriya sthanaye pereda (03)aluyama paya thunaka kalayak thula kala pariksha wakadi praweshapathra nomaniwa gaman kala magin wisipas deneku dumriya aarakshaka niladharin athadanguwata gena atha.athadanguwata gath siyaluma dena rajaye ha pudgalika anshaye rakiyawala nirathawu wan bawa kotuwa dumriya aarakshaka sewa meheyum eekakaye karyabhara niladhari danstan sibera mahatha pawasayi.mowun boho deneku kandayam washayen kalayak thisse dumriyawala pamina kollupitiya dumriya sthanayen basa kotuwa ha ee awata pradeshawala rakiya sthana kara gaman karana bawada dumriya aarakshaka niladharin hata thorathuru anawaranaya wi atha.athadanguwa gath magingen 21 denekugen eeye(04) dahawal wanawita rupiyal panas thundas anuwaka (53090/=) dadamudalak ayakaragena atha.
ohu kamathiyi kalawata athi mage dakshatha therum aran ee osse gamanak yanawata.
